name: Plantas Contra Zombies
description:
Contra zombie is a new topic of game, player wants to get rid of the zombie army's domination is to fight. Players' task is to collect weapons stored in boxes all over the map. A very difficult task is that player only gets one of the three weapons: sword, bow, or gun and the support of the villagers are 10 fireballs used in each level. The fierce of the game is that after a certain period of time the patrol is replenished, and within a certain amount of time player must obtain the required number of weapons.
Take up your weapons and perform any missions by contras zombies.
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
